**Wikipedia summary**:
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p>The <b>lingcod</b> or <b>ling cod</b> (<i>Ophiodon  elongatus</i>), also known as the <b>buffalo cod</b> or <b>cultus cod</b>, is a fish of the greenling family Hexagrammidae. It is the only extant member of the genus Ophiodon. A slightly larger, extinct species, <i>Ophiodon ozymandias</i>, is known from fossils from the Late Miocene of Southern California.
